Name: Northern Smoked Chicken
Title: Northern Smoked Chicken
Desc: This dish makes for a warm welcome for guests who come to the northern regions. Now, what manner of guests shall be "treated" to this hospitality this time?

Talent.Name: Northern Smoked Chicken
Talent.Desc: During this Round, the target character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> costs 1 less $[K309].\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)

K309.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>
K309.Desc: You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
